name: Koihime Musou ~A Heart-Throbbing, Maidenly Romance of the Three Kingdoms~
name_original: Koihime Musou ~A Heart-Throbbing, Maidenly Romance of the Three Kingdoms~
description: Kan’u, Chouhi, Shokatsuryou, Chouun, Bachou, and even Kouchuu! Kazuto has fallen into a parallel world based on the Romance of the Three Kingdoms, where all of the generals are beautiful girls, and an exciting romantic comedy awaits! There will be hardships, but there will be touching moments as well! Time travel? Are you kidding me? I eagerly rushed out of my dorm to try and catch a burglar who snuck into my school but next thing I knew, I was lying in a vast, open prairie. “What the Hell?!” But my amazement didn’t last long before I was surrounded by a group of men armed with glistening weapons! “Leave your clothes if you value your life,” What era is that line from?! I tried to resist them, but they started spouting gibberish before swinging their weapons at me. I thought, “This is it for me!” But then, a black-haired beauty appeared before me. She agilely swing her huge spear, and sent those men packing. As I respectfully thanked her, she began to name herself. “My name is Kan’u. My Lord, may we fight together and quell these wars?”​
